themes.label: Forex
themes.comment: Forex sentiment is subdued with mixed signals but overall leaning bearish, indicating cautious positioning amid uncertainty or risk-off dynamics.

themes.label: Actions
themes.comment: Equity sentiment is neutral, showing neither strong bullish nor bearish conviction, suggesting a wait-and-see approach by investors.

themes.label: Commodities
themes.comment: Commodities sentiment is robustly bullish, driven by strong demand expectations or inflation hedging strategies.

riskIndicators.label: Température du flux d’actualités
riskIndicators.comment: Volume agrégé d’environ 350 articles Alpha Vantage sur la fenêtre récente.

riskIndicators.label: Balance bull/bear globale
riskIndicators.comment: Environ 91% des articles sont haussiers contre 3% baissiers sur la période analysée.

focusDrivers.label: Forex Risk Aversion
focusDrivers.description: Despite some positive signals, the aggregated forex sentiment is weak, indicating cautious or risk-averse positioning in currency markets.

focusDrivers.label: Commodities Bullish Momentum
focusDrivers.description: Strong and consistent bullish sentiment in commodities suggests demand-driven optimism, possibly linked to inflation hedging or supply concerns.

focusDrivers.label: Equities Neutral Uncertainty
focusDrivers.description: Equity sentiment is balanced around neutral, reflecting investor indecision or awaiting clearer macroeconomic signals.

marketRegime.label: Divergent Sentiment Regime
marketRegime.description: Global sentiment is mixed with bearish bias in forex, neutral stance on equities, and bullish momentum in commodities, reflecting risk-off tendencies in currencies but selective optimism in raw materials.
